glsa.title: NTP: Multiple vulnerablities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in NTP, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: NTP contains software for the Network Time Protocol.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in NTP. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All NTP users should upgrade to the latest version:
